prompt:
SCENE: Visual showing monoid combination.
- LEFT side: Three colored orbs (representing values)
  - Red orb, Blue orb, Green orb - arranged vertically
- CENTER: Combination zone with swirling effect
- RIGHT side: One larger orb with mixed colors (combined result)
- BELOW: An empty/transparent orb labeled as identity (combines with any, returns unchanged)
- Flow arrows showing: orbs to combination to result

STYLE:
- RPG item aesthetic
- Glowing, magical effect
- Dark background with particle effects

EXPLICIT DIRECTIONS:
- Flow goes from LEFT to RIGHT (combination direction)
- Identity orb is clearly empty/transparent
- Arrows show: A + B = C pattern

CONSTRAINTS:
- No text
- No characters
- Family-friendly  
- Original artwork only
